channel.title: [Faction Suggestion]The Anarchy
channel.description:
> # [color=darkgreen]The Minion[/color] (converted from **[color=steblue]The Butler[/color]**) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Offensive[/color]** > > **Passive (Shady Fellow)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. > > **Day Ability (Deadly Poison)** - The next player you occupy will die.(1 Use - Will NOT work if the target is **Occupy Immune**) > > **Night Ability (Low Rank)** - Occupy a player.(Infinite Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.* > > # [color=darkgreen]The Minion[/color] (converted from **[color=steblue]The Drunk[/color]**) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Offensive[/color]** > > **Passive (Shady Fellow)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. > > **Day Ability (Annoyance)** - Make a player target you with their day abilities.(2 Uses) > > **Night Ability (For The Rebellion)** - Anyone targeting your target will target you instead.(2 Uses) > **Night Ability (Strong Will)** - Decide who your target targets tonight.(Infinite Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=darkgreen]The Spellcaster[/color] (converted from **[color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color]**) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Social[/color]** > > **Passive (Magic Book)** - Your votes will be reversed.(If you **Execute** someone , it will appear as you **Pardoned** that person. If you **Pardon** someone , it will appear as you **Executed** that person) > > **Day Ability (Third Dimension)** - For the next 20 seconds , your target will only be able to speak to you.(2 Uses - This applies to whispers too. Only you will be able to hear your target) > **Day Ability (Reveal)** - All **Pardon**/**Execute** votes will not count today.(1 Use - You choose which vote doesn't count) > > **Night Ability (Eavesdrop)** - Listen to **[color=steblue]The Prince[/color]** for the night.(3 Uses) > **Night Ability (Secret Note)** - Send a secret message to a player. They will not know who sent it.(Infinite Uses - Your whispers to that player will be hidden.) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=darkgreen]The Executioner[/color] (converted from **[color=steblue]The Hunter[/color]**) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Support[/color]** > > **Passive (Revengeful)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. > > **Day Ability (Ability Thief)** - Copy one of a player's night abilities.(Infinite Uses - Can NOT Target the Same Player Twice) > > **Night Ability (Ability Stolen)** - Ability information. > **Night Ability (Peacemaker)** - Guard **[color=gray]The King[/color]**. If they are **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchist King[/color]** , your identity will be revealed to them. If they are **[color=steblue]The Good King[/color]** and they use **Swear Fealty** , you will kill them.(2 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=darkgreen]The Outlaw[/color] (converted from **[color=steblue]The Knight[/color]**) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Killer[/color]** > > **Day Ability (Pressure)** - Disable a player's day abilities.(1 Use) > > **Night Ability (Shootout)** - If anyone visits you tonight , they will die.(2 Uses) > **Night Ability (Sacrifice)** - Protect a player from death. If you get attacked , they die instead of you.(Infinite Uses - Does NOT Bypass **Night Immunity** and **Healing**) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=darkgreen]The Seer[/color] (converted from **[color=steblue]The Mystic[/color]**] > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Investigative[/color]** > > **Passive (Spirit Shield)** - Immune to Death once. Your attacker will not know that you are immune. > > **Day Ability (Third Eye)** - Learn a player's faction.(3 Uses) > **Day Ability (Telepathy)** - Send a message to all the living **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy[/color]** members. Send a different message to all the living players.(2 Uses - **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy[/color]** members will be able to see both of your messages) > > **Night Ability (Adapt)** - You will appear as not suspicious tonight.(2 Uses) > **Night Ability (Mental Connection)** - Allow another player to talk to you tonight.(Infinite Uses - Your target will be framed) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=darkgreen]The Exiled[/color] (converted from **[color=steblue]The Noble[/color]**) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Social[/color]** > > **Passive (Royal Blood)** - During the election for a new **King** , votes for you count twice. > > **Day Ability (Royal Ties)** - If the King uses **Decide Fate** , they can NOT Use their night abilities.(Infinite Uses) > **Day Ability (Double Vote)** - Your decision during trial will be counted as two votes.(3 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Rumors)** - Get a player's abilities' feedback.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Mind Twist)** - Make a player receive incorrect feedback from their abilities and receive the correct feedback from their abilities.(2 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=darkgreen]The Watchdog[/color] (converted from **[color=steblue]The Observer[/color]**) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Killer[/color]** > > **Passive (Sharing is Caring)** - All living **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy[/color]** members will get your abilities' feedback. > **Passive (Companion)** - Your **Nightshade** can not be healed. > > **Night Ability (Track Down)** - If your target visits you tonight , they will be poisoned.(3 Uses - They will be notified the next day.) > **Night Ability (Follow)** - Follow a player to see who visits them and who they visit.(Infinite Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=darkgreen]The Sawbones[/color] (converted from **[color=steblue]The Physician[/color]**) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Support[/color]** > > **Passive (Remedy Studies)** - Immune to **Nightshade** and **Bleeding**. > **Passive (Unearth)** - Privately identifies what classes killed a player. > > **Day Ability (Examine)** - See if a player is a **Support** class.(2 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Standby)** - Prevent visits against yourself tonight.(3 Uses) > **Night Ability (Ressurect)** - "Revive" a dead player , decided who they target the next night. Their corpse can only be used once.(Infinite Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=darkgreen]The Queen[/color] (converted from **[color=steblue]The Princess[/color]**) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Investigative[/color]** > > **Passive (Royal Blood)** - During the election for a new **King** , votes for you will count twice. > > **Day Ability (Stealth Slap)** - Prevent a player from voting anyone today.(2 Uses - Will not Notify the target) > > **Night Ability (Clue)** - Get a clue to a player's class.(Infinite Uses - 1st Clue : **Your target's class type.** | 2nd Clue : **Your target's faction.**) > **Night Ability (Privacy)** - You will appear as not suspicious tonight.(2 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=darkgreen]The Ignored[/color] (converted from **[color=gray]The Scorned[/color]**/**[color=gray]The Fool[/color]**) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Social[/color]** > > **Passive (Resolve)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. Immune to Death at Night. > **Passive (Anti-Social)** - You must use an ability every day and every night in order to live. > > **Day Ability (Trollbox)** - Make it look like a player says something. They will not see the message.(Infinite Uses) > **Day Ability (Little Bird)** - "Occupy" a player. You will get their abilities' feedback.(2 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Frame)** - Make a player appear suspicious to investigative abilities.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Binary Code)** - Get a player's log.(2 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=steblue]New Blue Dragon Classes[/color] > # [color=steblue]The Diplomat[/color] (Guaranteed in [color=darkgreen]Anarchy[/color] games) > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigative[/color]** > > **Passive (Royal Blood)** - During the election for a new **King** , votes for you will count twice. > > **Day Ability (Bribery)** - Bribe a player , making them abstain from voting if someone is on trial.(2 Uses - Can NOT Target The King) > > **Night Ability (Confession)** - Target a player. If they accuse someone of treason tomorrow , you will learn their faction the next night.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Loyalty)** - You will become **Immune to Conversion** tonight.(1 Use) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.* > > **[color=darkgreen]Converts into[/color]:** > > # [color=darkgreen]The Ambassador[/color] > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Social[/color]** > > **Passive (Royal Blood)** - During the election for a new **King** , votes for you will count twice. > > **Day Ability (Bribery)** - Bribe a player , making them abstain from voting if someone is on trial.(2 Uses - Can NOT Target The King) > > **Night Ability (Spy)** - You will see the content of all whispers tomorrow.(2 Uses) > **Night Ability (Blackmail)** - Your target will be unable to hear **The Court** tomorrow.(3 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=steblue]The Crier[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color]** > > **Day Ability (Secret Message)** - Send a secret message to a player. They will not know who sent it. It will be sent at the end of the night.(Infinite Uses - Your whispers to that player will be hidden.) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]**/**[color=darkred]The Cult[/color]**/**[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.* > > **[color=darkgreen]Converts into[/color]:** > > # [color=darkgreen]The Mailman[/color] > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Social[/color]** > > **Day Ability (Secret Message)** - Send a secret message to a player. They will not know who sent it. It will be sent at the end of the night.(Infinite Uses - Your whispers to that player will be hidden.) > > **Night Ability (Contact)** - Check a player. If they are an **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy[/color]** member , your identity will be revealed to them.(Infinite Uses - Can NOT Target The King) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=steblue]The Peasant[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigative[/color]** > > **Night Ability (Beg)** - Beg at a player's room. If nobody visits that player BUT you , you will gain an extra charge of **Scouting The Castle**.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Scouting The Castle)** - Learn if **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]**/**[color=darkred]The Cult[/color]**/**[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** successfully use atleast one ability. You will become Immune to Death.(0 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]**/**[color=darkred]The Cult[/color]**/**[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.* > > **[color=darkgreen]Converts into[/color]:** > > # [color=darkgreen]The Farmer[/color] > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Investigative[/color]** > > **Passive (Profit)** - If you get investigated , you will commit suicide. (This doesn't include **The King**'s **Allies!** ability.) > > **Day Ability (Fluffy Companion)** - Send a sheep to follow a player. If they don't visit anyone or they attack someone , the sheep will die.(2 Uses - Does NOT Count as visiting. Can only have 1 sheep out at a time) > > **Night Ability (Ring The Bell!)** - Sound the bell , commanding any animal to come back to you.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Fox Companion)** - Send a fox to see if the player visits a member of **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]**.(Infinite Uses - Disabled if you have used **Fluffy Companion** the day before.) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=darkgreen]Anarchy Leaders[/color] > # [color=darkgreen]The Lone Wolf[/color] > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Special[/color]** > > **Passive (Trained)** - Immune to Death at night. > **Passive (Brutal Force)** - If someone attempts to **Occupy/Redirect** you , they will die. > **Passive (Patient)** - **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]**'s limit increases to 3 members. After 2 nights , the last **Recruit**'s target will commit suicide. Your **Recruit**'s cooldown will be gone.(Replacing **Brutal Force** when **Influencer** is used. This affect wears off after 2 nights. Member limit without this passive : 2 members) > > **Day Ability (Last Stand)** - Your attacks will bypass **Immunity/Healing** tonight.(1 Use - You will only be able to use **Headshot!** tonight) > **Day Ability (Influencer)** - You will become **Occupy/Redirection Immune** tonight. Your **Brutal Force** passive will be replaced with a new passive.(2 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Headshot!)** - Kill a player.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Recruit)** - Recruit a player to join **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]**. You will not know if the ability succeeded. Your identity to your target will not be revealed if it succeeded.(Infinite Uses | [1 Day Cooldown] | You will still be able to use this ability even if you succeeded but it will have no effect.) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.* > > + Member Count when **[color=darkgreen]The Lone Wolf[/color]** is **The Leader** : 2 members. > > + Unique Mechanic when **[color=darkgreen]The Lone Wolf[/color]** is **The Leader** : **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]**'s members will not know the identity of each other.
> # [color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color] > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Special[/color]** > > **Passive (Royal Blood)** - During the election for a new **King** , votes for you will count twice. > **Passive (High Standards)** - Immune to Death at night. All **Investigative** abilities against you will be prevented. > > **Day Ability (Seek Help)** - Get a players' night abilities' feedback tonight.(2 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Recruit)** - Recruit a player to join **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]**. You will know if this ability succeeded. Your identity will not be revealed to the target if it succeeded BUT their identity will be revealed to you if it succeeded.(Infinite Uses | [1 Day Cooldown] ) > **Night Ability (Careless)** - Get a player's exact role.(2 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.* > > # [color=darkgreen]The Empress' Right Hand[/color] (starting [color=darkgreen]Anarchy[/color] member when [color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color] is The Leader) > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Special[/color]** > > **Passive (Dedication)** - If **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]** dies or becomes **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchist Queen[/color]** , you will become **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]**. You will know who **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]** is. > **Passive (Seeking The Throne)** - If there is another **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy[/color]** member with **Royal Blood** , their 1st night ability will be switched with your first night ability. Whoever kills the other **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy[/color]** member that has **Royal Blood** or when the other member that has **Royal Blood** dies will become **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]**. > > **Day Ability (Shadow Cloak)** - Your abilities and **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]**'s abilities will not count as visiting tonight.(1 Use) > > **Night Ability (Attack)** - Kill a player.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Royal Connection)** - If your target has **Royal Blood** , you will kill them.(3 Uses - Replaces **Attack** when **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]** dies) > **Night Ability (For The Anarchy!)** - Protect **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]** from being **Attacked**/**Reaped**/**Occupied**/**Redirected**. You will kill those who **attack**/**reap**/**occupy**/**redirect** **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]**.(2 Uses - Does NOT Bypass **Healing** BUT Bypasses **Night Immunity**) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.* > > + Member Count when **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]** is **The Leader** : 3 members. > > + Unique Mechanic when **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]** is **The Leader** : **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]** will know who **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]** members are but they will not know who **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]** is. > > + Unique Mechanic when **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]** dies and **[color=darkgreen]The Empress's Right Hand[/color]** and an **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy[/color]** member with **Royal Blood** is alive : **[color=darkgreen]The Empress' Right Hand[/color]** and **[color=darkgreen]The Anarchy[/color]** member with **Royal Blood** will need to find each other. The one that finds the other first will become **[color=darkgreen]The Empress[/color]**.
> # [color=darkgreen]The Hitman[/color] > **[color=darkgreen]Anarchy Special[/color]** > > **Passive (Kevlar Armor)** - Death Immune once. If you are attacked , you will kill your attacker. > > **Day Ability (Focus)** - You will become **Occupy & Redirection Immune** tonight. (2 Uses) > **Day Ability (Mission Failed)** - Select a player. Upon your death , they will become the new **[color=darkgreen]Hitman[/color]**.(2 Use - Can not convert **[color=steblue]The Prince[/color]** or **[color=darkgray]Neutrals[/color]**. You will see if your target can be converted. Once selected , you can not change the player until they die UNLESS they are **Conversion Immune**.) > > **Night Ability (Headshot!)** - Kill a player. (Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Killer Senses)** - Kill a player that accused you of treason. Bypasses Healing/Death Immunity. You will appear not suspicious to **Investigative** abilities.(2 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.* > > + Member Count when **[color=darkgreen]The Hitman[/color]** is **The Leader** : 1 member. > > + Unique Mechanic when **[color=darkgreen]The Hitman[/color]** is **The Leader** : **[color=darkgreen]The Hitman[/color]** will attack players without getting information from their faction.

item.title: [Faction Suggestion]The Anarchy
item.dc:creator: justaneut
item.description:
Day Ability (Mission Failed) - Select a player. Upon your death , they will become the new Hitman .(2 Use - Can not convert The Prince or Neutrals . You will see if your target can be converted. Once selected , you can not change the player until they die UNLESS they are Conversion Immune .)

I like this prehaps even something you could make a NK around or something along the line

Read full topic

item.description:
Added some new classes o.O

item.title: [Faction Suggestion]The Anarchy
item.dc:creator: Dennis
item.description:
This is a really interesting and in-depth thread and what I really love is how the Lone Wolf does not now whether a convert failed or not, and the converts do not know his identity, meaning the game would require much more thought and strategy. I hope it makes it into the game!

Read full topic

item.title: [Faction Suggestion]The Anarchy
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Anarchy?

Idea!

Anarchist

Swap 2 other players cards without looking at it

Shoplifter

Swap your card with another player’s card and then look at your new card

Wildcard

Swap your card with a bottom card and then look at it

item.description:
prehaps change it into they cannot use here day abilities and you recieve there feedback instead for wording it would be a bit clearer what you mean (if it was also ment to prevent vote you need to add that in but as far as i could get it it was the first only)

item.title: [Faction Suggestion]The Anarchy
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
1. The Minion is converted from The Butler AND The Drunk. They each have their respective passives/abilities however.
  2. Thanks.
  3. No one hears him but you and he doesn’t know.
  4. You can copy ability 1 or 2. It will only have one charge however.
  5. Thanks.
  6. Gunna fix that right now.
  7. Watchdog can poison people.
  8. You misunderstood. It’s like a necromancer style ability.
  9. The Ability will not notify the target??? What are you talking about?
  10. 1st Use = 1st Clue , 2nd Use = 2nd Clue
  11. Indeed. Decided to leave Alchemist alone. Had plans for him so he would get converted.
  12. TOTAL CHAOS FTW!!
  13. They will get prevented and you get their abilities’ feedback. Change it or let it there?
  14. Forgot to change them lol. Thanks for da feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: [Faction Suggestion]The Anarchy
item.dc:creator: TheButterMage
item.description:
NAOtheRitualist:

The Minion (converted from The Butler/The Drunk )

Anarchy Offensive

Passive (Royal Blood) - During the election for a new King , votes for you will count twice.(For converted Drunks )
Passive (Shady Fellow) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection.(For converted Butlers & Drunks )

Day Ability (Annoyance) - Make a player target you with their day abilities.(2 Uses - For converted Drunks )
Day Ability (Deadly Poison) - The next player you occupy will die.(1 Use - Will NOT work if the target is Occupy Immune - For converted Butlers )

Night Ability (Low Rank) - Occupy a player.(Infinite Uses - For converted Butlers )
Night Ability (For The Rebellion) - Anyone targeting your target will target you instead.(2 Uses - For converted Drunks )
Night Ability (Strong Will) - Decide who your target targets tonight.(Infinite Uses - For converted Drunks )

Woah, why isn’t this just one class for drunk and another for butler? This is just confusing to read.

NAOtheRitualist:

Passive (Magic Book) - Your votes will be reversed.(If you Execute someone , it will appear as you Pardoned that person. If you Pardon someone , it will appear as you Executed that person)

A better description would be “Your votes will appear reversed”, but nice idea

NAOtheRitualist:

Day Ability (Blackmail) - For the next 20 seconds , your target will only be able to speak to you.(2 Uses - This applies to whispers too. Only you will be able to hear your target)

Is this like mystic, or is it no one hears them but you and he doesn’t know? This needs some clarification for me.

NAOtheRitualist:

Day Ability (Ability Thief) - Copy one of a player’s night abilities.(Infinite Uses - Can NOT Target the Same Player Twice)

Do you choose if you want ability 1 or 2? Can you choose not to use it and keep an ability between nights?

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Adapt) - You will appear as not suspicious tonight.(2 Uses)
Night Ability (Mental Connection) - Allow another player to talk to you tonight.(Infinite Uses - Your target will be framed)

I like the fact you risk being outed for not linking with the other ability. Makes the night choice interesting.

NAOtheRitualist:

Day Ability (Royal Ties) - If the King uses Decide Fate , it will appear reversed to the court.(Infinite Uses)

Appear? Does that mean it will say that king force exed in chat but actually force pardon happened? That would be instantly noticed and makes it useless.

NAOtheRitualist:

Passive (Companion) - Your Nightshade can not be healed.

This is a new antagonist faction like unseen and cult. You won’t get unseen alongside it, so this does almost nothing.

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Ressurect) - “Revive” a dead player , decided who they target the next night. Their corpse can only be used once.(Infinite Uses)

I don’t think the Devs want interaction between the living and dead, they’ve made sure to remove it from the game. This was because people would leave when they die when they shouldn’t. They opted to making no interaction with dead to make leaving when dead ok. This will definitely need a change.

NAOtheRitualist:

Day Ability (Stealth Slap) - Prevent a player from voting anyone today.(2 Uses - Will not Notify the target)

Is called “Stealth Slap” yet notifies the player. Not the best name.

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Clue) - Get a clue to a player’s class.(Infinite Uses - 1st Clue : Your target’s class type. | 2nd Clue : Your target’s faction. )

Do you get a random clue or both? Or do you get them in order with multiple clues on one person?

NAOtheRitualist:

(converted from The Scorned / The Fool )

Def an interesting idea, since they have to die.

NAOtheRitualist:

Passive (Anti-Social) - You must use an ability every day and every night in order to live.

That’s going to be mayhem and I love it.

NAOtheRitualist:

Day Ability (Little Bird) - “Occupy” a player. You will get their abilities’ feedback.(2 Uses)

Occupy as day ability? You may need to elaborate on how that works.

NAOtheRitualist:

Day Ability (Blackmail) - For the next 20 seconds , your target will only be able to speak to you.(2 Uses - This applies to whispers too. Only you will be able to hear your target)

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Blackmail) - Your target will be unable to hear The Court tomorrow.(3 Uses)

Having two abilities with the same name but different effects is confusing. I recommend changing one.

Overall, not too bad. You should also put that anarchy members don’t see each other from your first post too

Read full topic

item.title: [Faction Suggestion]The Anarchy
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Minion (converted from The Butler)

Anarchy Offensive

Passive (Shady Fellow) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection.

Day Ability (Deadly Poison) - The next player you occupy will die.(1 Use - Will NOT work if the target is Occupy Immune)

Night Ability (Low Rank) - Occupy a player.(Infinite Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Minion (converted from The Drunk)

Anarchy Offensive

Passive (Shady Fellow) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection.

Day Ability (Annoyance) - Make a player target you with their day abilities.(2 Uses)

Night Ability (For The Rebellion) - Anyone targeting your target will target you instead.(2 Uses)
Night Ability (Strong Will) - Decide who your target targets tonight.(Infinite Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Spellcaster (converted from The Court Wizard)

Anarchy Social

Passive (Magic Book) - Your votes will be reversed.(If you Execute someone , it will appear as you Pardoned that person. If you Pardon someone , it will appear as you Executed that person)

Day Ability (Third Dimension) - For the next 20 seconds , your target will only be able to speak to you.(2 Uses - This applies to whispers too. Only you will be able to hear your target)
Day Ability (Reveal) - All Pardon/Execute votes will not count today.(1 Use - You choose which vote doesn’t count)

Night Ability (Eavesdrop) - Listen to The Prince for the night.(3 Uses)
Night Ability (Secret Note) - Send a secret message to a player. They will not know who sent it.(Infinite Uses - Your whispers to that player will be hidden.)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Executioner (converted from The Hunter)

Anarchy Support

Passive (Revengeful) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection.

Day Ability (Ability Thief) - Copy one of a player’s night abilities.(Infinite Uses - Can NOT Target the Same Player Twice)

Night Ability (Ability Stolen) - Ability information.
Night Ability (Peacemaker) - Guard The King. If they are The Anarchist King , your identity will be revealed to them. If they are The Good King and they use Swear Fealty , you will kill them.(2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Outlaw (converted from The Knight)

Anarchy Killer

Day Ability (Pressure) - Disable a player’s day abilities.(1 Use)

Night Ability (Shootout) - If anyone visits you tonight , they will die.(2 Uses)
Night Ability (Sacrifice) - Protect a player from death. If you get attacked , they die instead of you.(Infinite Uses - Does NOT Bypass Night Immunity and Healing)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Seer (converted from The Mystic]

Anarchy Investigative

Passive (Spirit Shield) - Immune to Death once. Your attacker will not know that you are immune.

Day Ability (Third Eye) - Learn a player’s faction.(3 Uses)
Day Ability (Telepathy) - Send a message to all the living Anarchy members. Send a different message to all the living players.(2 Uses - Anarchy members will be able to see both of your messages)

Night Ability (Adapt) - You will appear as not suspicious tonight.(2 Uses)
Night Ability (Mental Connection) - Allow another player to talk to you tonight.(Infinite Uses - Your target will be framed)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Exiled (converted from The Noble)

Anarchy Social

Passive (Royal Blood) - During the election for a new King , votes for you count twice.

Day Ability (Royal Ties) - If the King uses Decide Fate , they can NOT Use their night abilities.(Infinite Uses)
Day Ability (Double Vote) - Your decision during trial will be counted as two votes.(3 Uses)

Night Ability (Rumors) - Get a player’s abilities’ feedback.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Mind Twist) - Make a player receive incorrect feedback from their abilities and receive the correct feedback from their abilities.(2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Watchdog (converted from The Observer)

Anarchy Killer

Passive (Sharing is Caring) - All living Anarchy members will get your abilities’ feedback.
Passive (Companion) - Your Nightshade can not be healed.

Night Ability (Track Down) - If your target visits you tonight , they will be poisoned.(3 Uses - They will be notified the next day.)
Night Ability (Follow) - Follow a player to see who visits them and who they visit.(Infinite Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Sawbones (converted from The Physician)

Anarchy Support

Passive (Remedy Studies) - Immune to Nightshade and Bleeding.
Passive (Unearth) - Privately identifies what classes killed a player.

Day Ability (Examine) - See if a player is a Support class.(2 Uses)

Night Ability (Standby) - Prevent visits against yourself tonight.(3 Uses)
Night Ability (Ressurect) - “Revive” a dead player , decided who they target the next night. Their corpse can only be used once.(Infinite Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Queen (converted from The Princess)

Anarchy Investigative

Passive (Royal Blood) - During the election for a new King , votes for you will count twice.

Day Ability (Stealth Slap) - Prevent a player from voting anyone today.(2 Uses - Will not Notify the target)

Night Ability (Clue) - Get a clue to a player’s class.(Infinite Uses - 1st Clue : Your target’s class type. | 2nd Clue : Your target’s faction.)
Night Ability (Privacy) - You will appear as not suspicious tonight.(2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Ignored (converted from The Scorned/The Fool)

Anarchy Social

Passive (Resolve) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. Immune to Death at Night.
Passive (Anti-Social) - You must use an ability every day and every night in order to live.

Day Ability (Trollbox) - Make it look like a player says something. They will not see the message.(Infinite Uses)
Day Ability (Little Bird) - “Occupy” a player. You will get their abilities’ feedback.(2 Uses)

Night Ability (Frame) - Make a player appear suspicious to investigative abilities.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Binary Code) - Get a player’s log.(2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

New Blue Dragon Classes

The Diplomat (Guaranteed in Anarchy games)

Blue Dragon Investigative

Passive (Royal Blood) - During the election for a new King , votes for you will count twice.

Day Ability (Bribery) - Bribe a player , making them abstain from voting if someone is on trial.(2 Uses - Can NOT Target The King)

Night Ability (Confession) - Target a player. If they accuse someone of treason tomorrow , you will learn their faction the next night.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Loyalty) - You will become Immune to Conversion tonight.(1 Use)
Goal: Defeat The Anarchy and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into:

The Ambassador

Anarchy Social

Passive (Royal Blood) - During the election for a new King , votes for you will count twice.

Day Ability (Bribery) - Bribe a player , making them abstain from voting if someone is on trial.(2 Uses - Can NOT Target The King)

Night Ability (Spy) - You will see the content of all whispers tomorrow.(2 Uses)
Night Ability (Blackmail) - Your target will be unable to hear The Court tomorrow.(3 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Crier

Blue Dragon Social

Day Ability (Secret Message) - Send a secret message to a player. They will not know who sent it. It will be sent at the end of the night.(Infinite Uses - Your whispers to that player will be hidden.)
Goal: Defeat The Anarchy/The Cult/The Unseen and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into:

The Mailman

Anarchy Social

Day Ability (Secret Message) - Send a secret message to a player. They will not know who sent it. It will be sent at the end of the night.(Infinite Uses - Your whispers to that player will be hidden.)

Night Ability (Contact) - Check a player. If they are an Anarchy member , your identity will be revealed to them.(Infinite Uses - Can NOT Target The King)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Peasant

Blue Dragon Investigative

Night Ability (Beg) - Beg at a player’s room. If nobody visits that player BUT you , you will gain an extra charge of Scouting The Castle.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Scouting The Castle) - Learn if The Anarchy/The Cult/The Unseen successfully use atleast one ability. You will become Immune to Death.(0 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Anarchy/The Cult/The Unseen and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into:

The Farmer

Anarchy Investigative

Passive (Profit) - If you get investigated , you will commit suicide. (This doesn’t include The King’s Allies! ability.)

Day Ability (Fluffy Companion) - Send a sheep to follow a player. If they don’t visit anyone or they attack someone , the sheep will die.(2 Uses - Does NOT Count as visiting. Can only have 1 sheep out at a time)

Night Ability (Ring The Bell!) - Sound the bell , commanding any animal to come back to you.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Fox Companion) - Send a fox to see if the player visits a member of The Anarchy.(Infinite Uses - Disabled if you have used Fluffy Companion the day before.)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Anarchy Leaders

The Lone Wolf

Anarchy Special

Passive (Trained) - Immune to Death at night.
Passive (Brutal Force) - If someone attempts to Occupy/Redirect you , they will die.
Passive (Patient) - The Anarchy’s limit increases to 3 members. After 2 nights , the last Recruit’s target will commit suicide. Your Recruit’s cooldown will be gone.(Replacing Brutal Force when Influencer is used. This affect wears off after 2 nights. Member limit without this passive : 2 members)

Day Ability (Last Stand) - Your attacks will bypass Immunity/Healing tonight.(1 Use - You will only be able to use Headshot! tonight)
Day Ability (Influencer) - You will become Occupy/Redirection Immune tonight. Your Brutal Force passive will be replaced with a new passive.(2 Uses)

Night Ability (Headshot!) - Kill a player.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Recruit) - Recruit a player to join The Anarchy. You will not know if the ability succeeded. Your identity to your target will not be revealed if it succeeded.(Infinite Uses | [1 Day Cooldown] | You will still be able to use this ability even if you succeeded but it will have no effect.)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

  • Member Count when The Lone Wolf is The Leader : 2 members.

  • Unique Mechanic when The Lone Wolf is The Leader : The Anarchy’s members will not know the identity of each other.

The Empress

Anarchy Special

Passive (Royal Blood) - During the election for a new King , votes for you will count twice.
Passive (High Standards) - Immune to Death at night. All Investigative abilities against you will be prevented.

Day Ability (Seek Help) - Get a players’ night abilities’ feedback tonight.(2 Uses)

Night Ability (Recruit) - Recruit a player to join The Anarchy. You will know if this ability succeeded. Your identity will not be revealed to the target if it succeeded BUT their identity will be revealed to you if it succeeded.(Infinite Uses | [1 Day Cooldown] )
Night Ability (Careless) - Get a player’s exact role.(2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Empress’ Right Hand (starting Anarchy member when The Empress is The Leader)

Anarchy Special

Passive (Dedication) - If The Empress dies or becomes The Anarchist Queen , you will become The Empress. You will know who The Empress is.
Passive (Seeking The Throne) - If there is another Anarchy member with Royal Blood , their 1st night ability will be switched with your first night ability. Whoever kills the other Anarchy member that has Royal Blood or when the other member that has Royal Blood dies will become The Empress.

Day Ability (Shadow Cloak) - Your abilities and The Empress’s abilities will not count as visiting tonight.(1 Use)

Night Ability (Attack) - Kill a player.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Royal Connection) - If your target has Royal Blood , you will kill them.(3 Uses - Replaces Attack when The Empress dies)
Night Ability (For The Anarchy!) - Protect The Empress from being Attacked/Reaped/Occupied/Redirected. You will kill those who attack/reap/occupy/redirect The Empress.(2 Uses - Does NOT Bypass Healing BUT Bypasses Night Immunity)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

  • Member Count when The Empress is The Leader : 3 members.

  • Unique Mechanic when The Empress is The Leader : The Empress will know who The Anarchy members are but they will not know who The Empress is.

  • Unique Mechanic when The Empress dies and The Empress’s Right Hand and an Anarchy member with Royal Blood is alive : The Empress’ Right Hand and The Anarchy member with Royal Blood will need to find each other. The one that finds the other first will become The Empress.

The Hitman

Anarchy Special

Passive (Kevlar Armor) - Death Immune once. If you are attacked , you will kill your attacker.

Day Ability (Focus) - You will become Occupy & Redirection Immune tonight. (2 Uses)
Day Ability (Mission Failed) - Select a player. Upon your death , they will become the new Hitman.(2 Use - Can not convert The Prince or Neutrals. You will see if your target can be converted. Once selected , you can not change the player until they die UNLESS they are Conversion Immune.)

Night Ability (Headshot!) - Kill a player. (Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Killer Senses) - Kill a player that accused you of treason. Bypasses Healing/Death Immunity. You will appear not suspicious to Investigative abilities.(2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

  • Member Count when The Hitman is The Leader : 1 member.

  • Unique Mechanic when The Hitman is The Leader : The Hitman will attack players without getting information from their faction.
